positions.title: IT Infrastructure, systems and security Manager

given.text: Peu de personnes sont à la fois bon manager, coach et mentor, mais ça été le cas lorsque j’ai collaboré avec monsieur CHEKIR durant mon stage chez Talan Tunisie. Je recommande fortement Abdou Manef CHEKIR en tant que chef d’équipe ou superviseur.

I had the pleasure of working with MANEF on several projects in Talan. Working with Manef was a great experience and i learned a lot from him. I have appreciated his organized approach to problem solving, and I look forward to working with him in the future

I had the pleasure of working with MANEF on several projects as he was IT manager in Talan Tunisia. it is characterized by high technical competence and a great experience in security and management of information systems.

I have worked with Manef at Systel for almost 2 years. Belonging to the same Group, I was one of his “Customers” in IT request processing. For personal skills, Manef has very good communication capabilities; he is a good listener and react politely to the collaborators’ (“his Customers”) requests with pat... Voir plus

Manef is an engineer having good problem solving skills. I worked with him in a project to integrate Comptel Number Management system for Ooredoo Tunisia. Manef was very helpful to me and I learnt very much from him.

Until just recently, I have been Manef's colleague for more than 5 years. I found him to be consistently pleasant, maintaining and improving our IT infrastructure and networks, tackling all requests with dedication and a smile. Besides being a joy to work with, Manef is a person who is able to present creative ideas ... Voir plus

received.text:
Disciplined and hardworking engineer having the ability to intelligently structure projects and inspiring others. Very great & professional skills, never abandon face to IT difficulties. He is listening and take care of customers needs & business objectives... Open mind Java expert, you will gain by making a strong collaboration with him... It was a pleasure to have such a guy in our company...  

... Voir plus
